subject: readability is good on soundcloud terms of service
text:
http://soundcloud.com/terms-of-use begin with an explanation of what
each section is about. I find that much more readable and fair than some
of the other terms where the user gets a long version on the left and a
"tip" or "human version" on the right, like 500px. Soundcloud's way seem
more fair and balanced and looks more like an invitation to read the
section the users cares about.
-- 
Hugo Roy
